title: How to get video file URL from Twitter
content:
I am looking how to find the video URL of a Twitter video so I can code a converter later (using nodejs or something), but I can't figure out how to do this. I saw this but it doesn't really clear anything up (I can't figure out where the json file they are talking about is)
Any help is appreciated

comments.text: You want to find video link of particular tweet or a generic solution?
a generic solution, I am trying to incorporate this into a nodejs (technically discord.js) program
